gobblin.writer

Class HiveWritableHdfsDataWriterBuilder<S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.writer.DataWriterBuilder<S,D>
      • gobblin.writer.PartitionAwareDataWriterBuilder<S,D>
        • gobblin.writer.FsDataWriterBuilder<S,Writable>
          • gobblin.writer.HiveWritableHdfsDataWriterBuilder<S>

  • public class HiveWritableHdfsDataWriterBuilder<S>
extends FsDataWriterBuilder<S,Writable>
    A DataWriterBuilder for building HiveWritableHdfsDataWriter. If properties WRITER_WRITABLE_CLASS, WRITER_OUTPUT_FORMAT_CLASS are both specified, their values will be used to create HiveWritableHdfsDataWriter. Otherwise, property HiveSerDeWrapper.SERDE_SERIALIZER_TYPE is required, which will be used to create a HiveSerDeWrapper that contains the information needed to create HiveWritableHdfsDataWriter.

      • validatePartitionSchema

        public boolean validatePartitionSchema(Schema partitionSchema)
        Description copied from class: PartitionAwareDataWriterBuilder
        Checks whether the PartitionAwareDataWriterBuilder is compatible with a given partition Schema. If this method returns false, the execution will crash with an error. If this method returns true, the DataWriterBuilder is expected to be able to understand the partitioning schema and handle it correctly.
        Overrides:
        validatePartitionSchema in class FsDataWriterBuilder<S,Writable>
        Parameters:
        partitionSchema - Schema of GenericRecord objects that will be passed to PartitionAwareDataWriterBuilder.forPartition(org.apache.avro.generic.GenericRecord).
        Returns:
        true if the DataWriterBuilder can understand the schema and is able to generate partitions from this schema.
